content.text:
CUB SCOUT GRADUATION

This is to certify that Jeffrey Epstein is a member of Pack [number] has fulfilled all requirements for advancement. After a satisfactory review of his record by his Scoutmaster, he is eligible to join a Boy Scout Troop. I especially recommend that the Boy Scout organization for further advancement in the various activities of scouting.

[Signatures and scout emblems visible]

Handwritten note below: 'No graduation kept!'

metadata.subject: Jeffrey Epstein's Cub Scout graduation certificate

insights: Official Cub Scout graduation certificate for Jeffrey Epstein
Shows participation in scouting as a youth
Certificate has official Boy Scout emblems and signatures
Handwritten note 'No graduation kept!' suggests someone noted this was retained
Personal childhood document included in birthday book
Demonstrates early organizational involvement and achievement

signatures.identified_as: Official scout leader signatures on certificate

logos: Boy Scout emblems and badges visible on certificate
